entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 2:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:07 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 2:07 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
